sections.Situation: Kogoro is asked to be a star in an educational television program. Once there with Ran and Conan, he is introduced to guest stars and studio members. Noburou Kimijima, the leading figure of Enka admired by Kogoro, has his priceless vase stolen during rehearsal. They deduce the culprit is still inside the studio room.

sections.Trivia:
- The Most Useful School in the World is one of Nippon TV's programs. The basic gist is that invited guests on the program talk about their given fields of work in easy to understand lectures.
- Noburou Kimijima's car is a black Mercedes-Benz C-Klasse [W204].
